channel.title: Canada on James Ransom
channel.description: Recent content in Canada on James Ransom

item.title: University superpowers: universities, societal challenges and city-building
item.description: Earlier this year I visited Canada to speak to city and university leaders in Toronto and the nearby city of Waterloo.

item.title: Universities: harnessing their superpowers
item.description: A report for KPMG UK on universities, societal challenges and city-building, based on research conducted in Canada.
